There is something to be said for including at least part of the previous 
message.  I'm afraid I have to ask "the source for what"?

Between work and home, I get well over 200 e-mails a day and I can't always 
remember what I've written to whom.

If you will remind me of what I wrote, I'd be happy to track down the source 
for you.

Bob Burke


In a message dated 12/17/03 5:17:45 PM, junkmail@... writes:

<< Bob-
    Tantalizing little piece, would love to know your source. Especially 
the bit about the swords. Satsuma "rebellion" swords are often seen and 
dismissed for their low quality. I had however never heard that they 
were from the arsenal at Kagoshima, which would add a delicious new 
wrinkle to the story...
-t
